Text.Page:
The banquet in Velika-a celebration of peace-was ruined when an enormous Black Dragon appeared and destroyed the city.
The death of the goddess Velik shook the citizen to their core, but Mystel arrived just in time to teleport you to safety... into the past.

You appeared in Velika, three days before the banquet.

Mystel has sent you to the past.
Hearing that a horde of dragons is attacking Elenea, you go to Elenea yourself, and find Verdas, still alive.

Ah, . I just sent you an invitation to the banquet.

The city has decided to throw a party, and it's essentially in your honor.

All that we've done together, the challenges we've faced...It's almost too much to remember, isn't it?

Still, there's no shortage of problems to deal with..."I don't remember that..."

Dragons are attacking Elenea. The troops there don't stand a chance without some support, so I sent the bulk of the Velika city guard to help them.

I've never seen dragons acting together like this... but it's unlikely that Lakan or his followers have anything to do with it.

I'm sorry to ask, especially right before the banquet, but would you go to Elenea and help our troops?

Talk to Maius about transport.

Hello, !

Heading to Elenea?
If you hurry, I think you can still catch up with Bellenun.

Bellenun can get you there, and get you on the right track.

So, you're going to Elenea! That's a relief! The dragons are already more than our troops can handle, and they just keep coming.

They'll be relieved to hear you're going to help. I can get you on your way to Elenea.

Just tell me when you're ready to move out.

Yes, the reinforcements have arrived from Velika, thank the gods.

Verdas? No, I don't know anyone by that name.

Is he a friend of yours? Maybe he's over there with the wounded soldiers.
